documents.document: This week, I finally hit my 300th photo! It’s all downhill from here, folks… or is it? After seeing 300 of 366, I realized how close I am to the end of this photo journey. 300 unique photos, each with their own little story behind them, and only 66 stories to go before I complete [...]

I have gone to four Army-Navy games in my life, which also happen to be the last four Army-Navy games that were played. I’m proud to say my team has won each time and has done so consecutively for the past 11 years! Each game is always exciting and we always have a great time [...]

Since Hurricane Sandy, I have been just going and going and going… My little accident with the deer has set be back a bit and I had to do extra running around now that I am borrowing my parents’ car. But I am lucky that I was able to use their car because it could [...]

Well after several years of hype and speculation, it seems like the Mayans were wrong about the world ending on December 21, 2012… or rather, 21st century people were wrong about their interpretations of the Mayan Calendar, which made no real mentions about the end of the world. Life goes on and we all will [...]

2013 is upon us! It will be hard to top 2012 as I think it was one of my better years, but I can at least make an attempt to maintain everything I built up in the past year. I decided to start it off right by reformatting my computer. I had some issues with [...]

The first full week of 2013 was a nice start to the year. I saw The Hobbit with Kristin, which was pretty good, but kind of long at certain parts. It was nice to enjoy a beer with the movie at the dine-in theater, which in itself, is a great idea. I also decided to [...]

This past week was a so-so week. Not too exciting, and a little rough around the edges. I started off by doing some experimenting with long exposures in my car. It was a simple setup. I strapped my camera mounted to my tripod in the back seat of my car, then I used my remote [...]

January is a dull month. It’s too cold, too dark, too damp, and too long. I guess being in the dead of winter doesn’t help it much either… I found myself not really doing anything too interesting this week, but I still got my photos as usual. I noticed this week was mostly filled with [...]

IÂ can’t believe I’m actually in the 10 days of my 365 project! Nearly a whole year has gone by in what seems like the blink of an eye, and I’m still not out of ideas nor do I feel like I really shot it all. So much has happened in these past 51 weeks, [...]

I did it! I just finished my first 365 project! One full year of my life has been more or less documented every single day, starting on my 10,000th day of life on February 9, 2012. From there, I just kept doing what I do best: taking pictures. This project in particular has been very [...]
